title: Advanced TicTacToe
subtitle: (Socket-based Multiplayer Mobile Game)
description: Developed a Real-time TicTacToe Application with built-in FriendList Management System like PUBG, integrated Real Time Challanges, QR Room's with proper Authentication, password reset system, implemented hashing mechanisms to provide security.

title: Shop-it

description: Developed an E-commerce web & mobile Application using MERN stack. integrated Real Time Challanges, QR Room's with proper Authentication, password reset system, implemented hashing mechanisms to provide security.

title: NEWS APP

description: built-in FriendList Management System like PUBG, integrated Real Time Challanges, QR Room's functionality. Integrated proper Authentication, password reset, hashing mechanisms to provide security.
